articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: St Johnstone v Rangers - Goldson absent for first time in 82 games
articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow live text updates as St Johnstone host Rangers, before the rest of Saturday's action.
articles.content: Connor Goldson had played every minute of Rangers last 81 competitive games. Some achievement. The defender misses out this afternoon, though.
